channel.title: math.SG updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SG updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: The linearized Floer equation in a chart
item.description: arXiv:2510.20945v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this article we are considering the Hessian of the area functional in a non-Darboux chart. This does not seem to have been considered before and leads to an interesting new mathematical structure which we introduce in this article and refer to as \emph{almost extendable weak Hessian~field}. Our main result is a Fredholm theorem for Robbin-Salamon operators associated to \emph{non-continuous} Hessians which we prove by taking advantage of this new structure.
item.dc:creator: Urs Frauenfelder, Joa Weber

item.title: A non-autonomous Hamiltonian diffeomorphism with roots of all orders
item.description: arXiv:2502.06467v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We present a way of constructing non-autonomous Hamiltonian diffeomorphisms with roots of all orders by adapting the Anosov-Katok construction. This answers a question by Kathryn Mann and Egor Shelukin. Additionally, we construct an action of the rationals by diffeomorphism on any manifold that is not $C^0$-continuous with respect to the Euclidean topology on $\mathbb Q$.
item.dc:creator: Nicolas Grunder, Baptiste Serraille
